content: {"name": "Montclair Emergency Services for the Homeless (MESH)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Starting December 1st ,MESH will be having sleeping spots for the homless at 51 elm street at st mark methodist church from 7pm to 7am", "email": "", "url": "Montclair Emergency Services for the Homeless (MESH)", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "619 Bloomfield Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Montclair", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07042", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8163926, "longitude": -74.2204775}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 692-8857", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "20:30", "closes_at": "22:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "20:30", "closes_at": "22:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "20:30", "closes_at": "22:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "20:30", "closes_at": "22:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "20:30", "closes_at": "22:30"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "20:30", "closes_at": "22:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No ID is required."}]}
